error.check-email: Please enter your email address correctly.
error.filter-comp: Color correction on selected photos has been saved.
error.filter-cnt-error: You can color correct only {count} images at once.
error.error: Please try again after a while.

splash.desc2:
Take a photo with a smartphone
camera at underwater
splash.desc3:
Automatic logbook
will be created after diving

device.device-desc:
Serial registration is needed to use the snorkeling mode.
Prepare the housing for the registration.

scan.complete: Your UNIVERAL Lite has been registered.
scan.do-scan: Check the 8 letters of serial number printed inside the housing for product warranty.
scan.check-scan: Check the 8 letters of serial number printed inside the housing for product warranty.

camera.do-scan:
Position the serial number on the 
back of your housing in the rectangle area.
camera.check-scan:
Check if the serial number
has been entered correctly.

auth.sub:
Please enable access to
the following features
to use DIVEROID
auth.desc: Disabled access may cause restrictions in using the service.
auth.bluetooth-desc: Required for using bluetooth and enabling other exceptional cases
auth.camera-desc: Required for filming and downloading images
auth.location-desc: Required for creating log data, dive location recommendation, and sending location message

dive.check-device-desc: You can use snorkeling mode after registering the serial number of UNIVERSAL Lite.

camera.title: Default setting
camera.location-tooltip: You can share your location with the registered contacts.

edit.delect-desc: Would you like to delete the selected media?

collection.title: Collection
collection.empty-desc:
Create your own collection by
collecting photos taken by DIVEROID

edit.title: Edit collection
edit.del-desc: Deleting collection will not delete photos and videos

delete.check: Are you sure you want to delete the collection ‘{name}’?
delete.check-desc: Deleting collection will not delete photos and videos from the gallery.

media.delete-collection: Would you like to delete items from this collection only? OR Would you like to delete them from all collections?

device.title: My device
device.no-device-desc: Please connect your device to DIVEROID Lite app and use it.
device.serial-desc1: In order to register different serial number, the current serial number needs to be removed.
device.serial-desc2: In order to use the UNIVERSAL Housing on a different account, first remove its serial number on the currently logged in account.
device.serial-desc3: Warranty period is 2 years from the day of registration.

delete.title: Remove serial number
delete.cont: Are you sure you want to remove the UNIVERSAL Lite’s serial?

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc:
If the product is damaged or defective, please provide the details with an image of the product. Irrelevant or illegal contents will be deleted without notice.

We are implementing protective measures for customer service workers according to the Occupational Safety and Health Law. Abusive language, sexual harassment, aggression, and any conduct that causes physical or emotional distress will not be responded to.
contact.file-sub1: Please don’t include personal information in the attached files.
contact.file-sub2: You can upload upto 5 images and 2 videos of a minute length.
